0.text: Innate: When LeBlanc is damaged to  40% maximum health, she creates a  clone of herself, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 1 second.

1.text: The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of LeBlanc decided the moment it spawns.

2.text: Mirror Image can occur only once every few seconds.

3.text: See Pets for more details about LeBlanc's clone.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb at the target enemy that upon arrival deals them magic damage and marks them for 3.5 seconds.

1.text: Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the  same damage again.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for its duration.

1.text: Recast: LeBlanc  blinks to Distortion's return pad, regardless of range.

2.text: Distortion will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that latches onto the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.

1.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is  revealed and  rooted for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of her most recently used basic ability, applying the same effects and dealing modified magic damage.

1.text: Mimic: Sigil of Malice: Deals modified damage and double damage upon triggering the mark.

3.text: Mimic: Ethereal Chains: Deals modified damage and double damage upon rooting.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:

+200 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CINDERBLOOM: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a  shield within the last 5 seconds.

+45 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
